parameters.name: CapPlanar
parameters.description: True to cap the flat openings of surfaces to define closed volumes, false to not

parameters.name: RegionType
parameters.description: Type of regions to create: 0 = Intersecting regions 1 = Internal regions 2 = Intersecting and internal regions

title: IFeatureManager.PreIntersect2
signature:
System.Object PreIntersect2( 
   System.Boolean
CapPlanar
,
   System.Int32
RegionType
)

parameters.name: CapPlanar
parameters.description: True to cap the flat openings of surfaces to define closed volumes, false to not

parameters.name: RegionType
parameters.description: Type of regions to create: 0 = Intersecting regions 1 = Internal regions 2 = Intersecting and internal regions

remarks:
Before calling this method, you must select the intersecting
surfaces
,
solids
, or
planes
that make up the intersect feature.
After calling this method, call
IFeatureManager::PostIntersect
to create the intersect feature.
